projects.title: DealFlow
projects.description: Real Estate Deal Management SaaS for tracking property deals, managing contacts, and analyzing investment opportunities. Built for real estate professionals who need to manage complex deal pipelines.
projects.problem: Real estate teams struggled with spreadsheets and disconnected tools for deal tracking
projects.solution: Built a unified platform with deal pipelines, CRM, and financial calculators
projects.impact: Reduced deal processing time by 40% for beta users

projects.title: Portfolio 2026
projects.description: High-performance developer portfolio showcasing modern web development practices. Features 3D graphics, command palette, and interactive terminalâ€”all with static generation for instant load times.
projects.problem: Needed a portfolio that demonstrates technical depth, not just lists skills
projects.solution: Built immersive UX with React Three Fiber, Framer Motion, and static MDX blog
projects.impact: Sub-second initial load, 100 Lighthouse performance score

projects.title: LinkHub
projects.description: Link-in-bio platform with customizable themes, analytics, and real-time click tracking. Full-stack solution with authentication, drag-and-drop ordering, and embeddable widgets.
projects.problem: Content creators needed a self-hosted alternative to Linktree with more control
projects.solution: Built open-source platform with Supabase backend and real-time analytics
projects.impact: Open-source project with active community contributions

experiments.title: QR Nexus
experiments.description: QR code generator and scanner with batch processing capabilities
